scriptures.content: Then Joseph could not <crossref let="p" cid="c01045001.1"/>control himself before all those who stood by him. He cried, "Make everyone go out from me. " So no one stayed with him when Joseph made himself known to his brothers.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: And he wept aloud, so that the Egyptians heard it, and the household of Pharaoh heard it.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: And Joseph said to his brothers, <crossref let="q" cid="c01045003.1"/>"I am Joseph! Is my father still alive?" But his brothers could not answer him, for they were dismayed at his presence.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: So Joseph said to his brothers, "Come near to me, please. " And they came near. And he said, "I am your brother, Joseph, <crossref let="r" cid="c01045004.1"/>whom you sold into Egypt.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: And now do not be distressed or angry with yourselves because you sold me here, <crossref let="s" cid="c01045005.1"/>for God sent me before you to preserve life.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: For the famine has been in the land these two years, and there are <crossref let="t" cid="c01045006.1"/>yet five years in which there will be neither <crossref let="u" cid="c01045006.2"/>plowing nor harvest.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: And God sent me before you to preserve for you a remnant on earth, and to keep alive for you many survivors.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: So it was not you who sent me here, but God. He has made me a father to Pharaoh, and lord of all his house and <crossref let="v" cid="c01045008.1"/>ruler over all the land of Egypt.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: Hurry and go up to my father and say to him, 'Thus says your son Joseph, God has made me lord of all Egypt. Come down to me; do not tarry.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: <crossref let="w" cid="c01045010.1"/>You shall dwell in the land of Goshen, and you shall be near me, you and your children and your children's children, and your flocks, your herds, and all that you have.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: <crossref let="x" cid="c01045011.1"/>There I will provide for you, for there are yet five years of famine to come, so that you and your household, and all that you have, do not come to poverty. '
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: And now your eyes see, and the eyes of my brother Benjamin see, that it is <crossref let="y" cid="c01045012.1"/>my mouth that speaks to you.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: You must tell my father of all my honor in Egypt, and of all that you have seen. Hurry and <crossref let="z" cid="c01045013.1"/>bring my father down here. "
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: Then he fell upon his brother Benjamin's neck and wept, and Benjamin wept upon his neck.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: And he kissed all his brothers and wept upon them. After that his brothers talked with him.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: When the report was heard in Pharaoh's house, "Joseph's brothers have come," it pleased Pharaoh and his servants.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: And Pharaoh said to Joseph, "Say to your brothers, 'Do this: load your beasts and go back to the land of Canaan,
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: and take your father and your households, and come to me, and <crossref let="a" cid="c01045018.1"/>I will give you the best of the land of Egypt, and you shall eat the fat of the land. '
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: And you, Joseph, are commanded to say, 'Do this: take <crossref let="b" cid="c01045019.1"/>wagons from the land of Egypt for your little ones and for your wives, and bring your father, and come.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: Have no concern forHebrew Let your eye not pity your goods, for the best of all the land of Egypt is yours. '"
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: The sons of Israel did so: and Joseph gave them <crossref let="b" cid="c01045021.1"/>wagons, according to the command of Pharaoh, and gave them provisions for the journey.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: To each and all of them he gave a change of clothes, but to Benjamin he gave three hundred shekelsA shekel was about 2/5 ounce or 11 grams of silver and five changes of clothes.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: To his father he sent as follows: ten donkeys loaded with the good things of Egypt, and ten female donkeys loaded with grain, bread, and provision for his father on the journey.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: Then he sent his brothers away, and as they departed, he said to them, <crossref let="e" cid="c01045024.1"/>"Do not quarrel on the way. "
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: So they went up out of Egypt and came to the land of Canaan to their father Jacob.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: And they told him, "Joseph is still alive, and he is ruler over all the land of Egypt. " And his heart became numb, for he did not believe them.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: But when they told him all the words of Joseph, which he had said to them, and when he saw <crossref let="f" cid="c01045027.1"/>the wagons that Joseph had sent to carry him, the spirit of their father Jacob revived.
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

scriptures.content: And Israel said, "It is enough; Joseph my son is still alive. I will go and see him before I die. "<end-chapter/>
scriptures.section_title: Joseph Provides for His Brothers and Family

n01045022.1.content: A shekel was about 2/5 ounce or 11 grams
